resources.string: You need to move your eyes from left to right. Do it slowly for a minute.
Choose a point that is close to you and a point that is far away, maybe outside the window. Focus on them one by one for a minute.
Blink quickly and easily for 2 minutes. Helps improve blood circulation
Excellent relieves tension from the eye muscles. With your eyes open, draw a horizontal figure 8 in the air. Several times on one side and several times on the other
Helps to rest the eyes and restore all eye systems. Close your eyelids and cover them with your palms for 5 minutes. Don\'t fall asleep during these one:)
